overview: SOMEBODY SAY SOMETHIN ‘BOUT FIRED UP?!  This guest of the series that changed the game is ready to get fired up for your questions! Tommy “Wildfire” Rich takes the YouShoot oath and is prepared to tell you stories that range from his love of ECW to his hatred of anyone named Crockett. Tommy is old school to the bone and he’s loaded with stories about yesteryear’s road trips, including his pre-match…err…”training sessions.”  From Harley to Barnett, Dundee to Atlas, and all the names in between, Tommy gives you the inside dish on everything you asked. It’s all here…in the one and only series that lets the shooters SHOOT….YOUSHOOT!
title: YouShoot: Tommy Rich
